ACT
173
Revocation of the will
The testator may revoke each of his wills before the person authorized to draw up a public will, regardless of the form in which it was made.
The provisions of this Act on the drafting of a public will shall be applied accordingly to the revocation of a will before a person authorized to draw up a public will.
When the testator revokes the will, the revocation shall be recorded on the will, if it is kept by the authorized person before whom it was revoked.
Notification that the will has been revoked shall be delivered to the Croatian Register of Wills without delay.
